answers.answer: Won't be able to guess the sex as u can only guess from 16 weeks sorry and that's sometimes too early xxx
They told me the sex of the baby at 13 wks when I went in for the gestational diabetes test
I found out I was having a girl at 14 weeks & 3 days and I'm now 22 weeks & 2 days and she's still a girl!! :) congrats!

I'm 20 weeks, and today we Tryed listening to the heart beat for the first time. The only noise we could hear was the vibration of the heart beat in my umbilical cord and the baby moving which was really cool. I had a ultrasound at 13 and they did not tell me the gender im going in on Friday for my second ultrasound I'm hoping they will be able to tell me the gender :)

question: I was so excited n hoping I could hear the heart beat bt I wasn't far enough to hear it bt I was still happy. in 5 weeks I get my ultrasound hopefully they cn guess the sex ill be 14 weeks. This is an exciting experience even tho this will be my first and only child. I just wanted to share that lol
title: first appointment!!! :)
